00037 #include "egs_source_collection.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_SourceCollection::EGS_SourceCollection(EGS_Input *input,
00041     EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(input,f), nsource(0), count(0) {
00042     vector<EGS_BaseSource *> s;
00043     egsInformation("EGS_BaseSource::EGS_BaseSource: input is:\n");
00044     input->print(0,cout);
00045     EGS_Input *isource;
00046     while( (isource = input->takeInputItem("source",false)) ) {
00047         egsInformation("EGS_SourceCollection: got input\n");
00048         EGS_BaseSource *this_source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(isource);
00049         if(!this_source) egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: got null source\n");
00050         else s.push_back(this_source);
00051         delete isource;
00052     }
00053     vector<string> snames;
00054     int err = input->getInput("source names",snames);
00055     if( !err ) {
00056         for(unsigned int j=0; j<snames.size(); j++) {
00057             EGS_BaseSource *this_source = EGS_BaseSource::getSource(snames[j]);
00058             if(!this_source)
00059                 egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: got null source\n");
00060             else s.push_back(this_source);
00061         }
00062     }
00063     if( s.size() < 1 ) {
00064         egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: no sources\n"); return;
00065     }
00066     vector<EGS_Float> prob;
00067     err = input->getInput("weights",prob);
00068     if( err ) {
00069         egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: missing 'weights' input\n");
00070         return;
00071     }
00072     if( prob.size() != s.size() ) {
00073         egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: the number of sources (%d) is not"
00074              " the same as the number of input probabilities (%d)\n",
00075              s.size(),prob.size()); return;
00076     }
00077     setUp(s,prob);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void EGS_SourceCollection::setUp(const vector<EGS_BaseSource *> &S,
00081         const vector<EGS_Float> &prob) {
00082     otype = "EGS_SourceCollection";
00083     nsource = S.size();
00084     if( prob.size() < nsource ) nsource = prob.size();
00085     description = "Invalid source collection";
00086     if( isValid() ) {
00087         p = new EGS_Float [nsource]; EGS_Float *dum = new EGS_Float [nsource];
00088         sources = new EGS_BaseSource* [nsource];
00089         Emax = 0;
00090         for(int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00091             p[j] = prob[j]; sources[j] = S[j];
00092             if( p[j] < 0 || !sources[j] ) {
00093                 if( p[j] < 0 ) egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: input "
00094                      "probability p[%d]=%g is less than zero.\n",j,p[j]);
00095                 else egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: source %d is null\n",j);
00096                 delete [] p; delete [] dum;
00097                 for(int i=0; i<j; j++) EGS_Object::deleteObject(sources[i]);
00098                 delete [] sources; nsource = 0; return;
00099             }
00100             dum[j] = 1; sources[j]->ref();
00101             EGS_Float e = sources[j]->getEmax();
00102             if( e > Emax ) Emax = e;
00103         }
00104         table = new EGS_AliasTable(nsource,dum,p,0);
00105         delete [] dum;
00106         description = "Source collection";
00107         last_cases = new EGS_I64 [ nsource ];
00108         for(int i=0; i<nsource; i++) last_cases[i] = 0;
00109     }
00110 }

00112 extern "C" {
00113 
00114 EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource* createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00115         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) { return
00116     createSourceTemplate<EGS_SourceCollection>(input,f,"source collection");
00117 }
